# plotBart

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

plotBart is a supplemental plotting package to bartCause and thinkCausal.

## Installation

plotBart is currently in development and is available to test by installing via:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joemarlo/plotBart")
```
